entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Why are you backing the protesters?They’re not social distancing and not wearing masks. I’m sure some of them already have Coronavirus. Don’t you realize they’ll probably spread it to all their fellow morons and maybe die. You need these morons. You’re killing your own base. 🤦🏼‍♂️
